# prepareOpenGL()

**Instance Method**

Used by subclasses to initialize OpenGL state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func prepareOpenGL()
```

## Discussion

This method is called only once after the OpenGL context is made the current context. Subclasses that implement this method can use it to configure the Open GL state in preparation for drawing.

## Managing the NSOpenGLContext

- **clearGLContext()**: Releases the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLContext] object associated with the view.
- **openGLContext**: The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenGLContext] object associated with the receiver.
